title: Hormone Balance Crystal Set, 3 Stones with Information Sheet
description: A set of 3 crystal stones that may help with hormone balance. The crystals included in this set are Labradorite, Moonstone and Opalite.
cleaned_text: A set of 3 crystal stones that may help with hormone balance. The crystals included in this set are:- * Labradorite * Moonstone * Opalite Also included is an information sheet about the stones and how to work with them. All the stones are labelled for easy identification. The set is presented in a green coloured organza bag. Please note that sizes, shapes and colours of crystals may vary as each crystal is unique. See more crystal healing sets [here](https://tkemporium.co.uk/collections/crystal-healing-sets) Size: 7 x 8 cm approx Weight 20 grams approx
